game_description: Try to solve our quest and survive! You are playing for a mentally ill and you need to get out of a mental institution. The world you are in is strange and eerie. You will encounter interesting puzzles, extraordinary plot and frightening enemies.
review_1: I think you [the devs] know what needs to be done. It’s definitely going to stand out among the VR Horror titles. I couldn’t get past the doctor after the “Mosquito Bite” scene due to him running in place and then killing me when I let him get unstuck lol Ultra settings shouldn’t be available for the Quest 2 because the performance is volatile to the hardware. I’ll give it 5 if it improves- I’m sure it will!
review_2: Good graphics, enough tension to rattle your nerves. The tutorial, however, is not great at all. Point, click, hope you're right.
review_3: This is really atmospheric. Gory brilliant graphics. And the creepy background sounds. Christ it’s eerie but in a great way. Mechanics not too bad
